subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Access to GPT-4o with usage caps of up to 80 messages every 3 hours. Higher limits for GPT-4o mini and older models.
5x more usage than the free tier, with a maximum capacity that allows for extended conversations but is not defined by a specific token count. Access to the Claude 3.5 Sonnet model.
Same as Claude 3.5 Sonnet subscription, with higher usage limits compared to the free tier.
Part of Google One AI Premium. Provides access to the 1.5 Pro model within Gemini chat interfaces. Usage limits are higher than the free tier but not explicitly token-based.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High and rapidly growing; the $20/month price point has become a standard for premium consumer access across major providers.
pricing_analysis.trend: Intense price competition and specialization. Major models (GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet) are significantly cheaper than predecessors. A new tier of ultra-efficient, low-cost models (like Haiku and Llama 3 70B) is emerging for high-volume tasks. The $20/month subscription is now the default for premium consumer access.
